resources.string:
To solve a Sudoku problem,
 1. Click on "Solve Sudoku" button.
 2. Select the difficulty and solve the puzzle.
 3. You can only make 3 wrong moves.
 4. You can use hint only 3 times.
 How to get a solution?
 1. Click on "Get a solution" button.
 2. A Sudoku grid will appear.
 3. Fill it with your Sudoku problem.
 4. Hit the "Solve it!" button.
 5. If your problem was valid, you will get a valid solution.
 6. In case of an error, you can also use the eraser.
 7. If you just want some part of the solution(not all), then hit the hint button.
 8. You can use hint only 3 times.
